languages.text: "Чуть не отхватила мой палец вместе с куском алцедонта. Моя вина — вечно забываю, что они хищники. Пусть и ручные".

traits.locale_text: "Чуть не отхватила мой палец вместе с куском алцедонта. Моя вина — вечно забываю, что они хищники. Пусть и ручные".

languages.text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."
languages.original_text: "Чуть не отхватила мой палец вместе с куском алцедонта. Моя вина — вечно забываю, что они хищники. Пусть и ручные".

traits.locale_text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. Blame me for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."
"She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. Blame me for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."
"She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."
"She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."
"She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."
"She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."

languages.text: “她差点把我的手指和角兽肉一起吞下去。这得怪我，尽管她已经被驯服了，但依然保留着掠食者的本性。”
languages.original_text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."

traits.locale_text: “她差点把我的手指和角兽肉一起吞下去。这得怪我，尽管她已经被驯服了，但依然保留着掠食者的本性。”

languages.text: «Casi me arranca un dedo junto con la loncha de carne de alcedonte que le estaba dando de comer. La culpa es mía por olvidar que son depredadores, por muy domesticados que estén».
languages.original_text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."

traits.locale_text: «Casi me arranca un dedo junto con la loncha de carne de alcedonte que le estaba dando de comer. La culpa es mía por olvidar que son depredadores, por muy domesticados que estén».

languages.text: "Bir dilim alsedont yiyecek diye neredeyse parmağımı koparıyordu. Evcil de olsalar yırtıcı olduklarını unutmamak lazım."
languages.original_text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."

traits.locale_text: "Bir dilim alsedont yiyecek diye neredeyse parmağımı koparıyordu. Evcil de olsalar yırtıcı olduklarını unutmamak lazım."

languages.text: 「アルセドントの一切れでほとんど私の指をちぎるところでした。たとえ、ペットであっても、彼らが肉食動物であるということを忘れていた私の落ち度です」
languages.original_text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."

traits.locale_text: 「アルセドントの一切れでほとんど私の指をちぎるところでした。たとえ、ペットであっても、彼らが肉食動物であるということを忘れていた私の落ち度です」

languages.text: « Elle a failli m'arracher un doigt en dévorant une tranche d'alcedont. J'ai tendance à oublier que, bien que domestiquées, ces créatures n'en demeurent pas moins de féroces prédateurs. »
languages.original_text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."

traits.locale_text: « Elle a failli m'arracher un doigt en dévorant une tranche d'alcedont. J'ai tendance à oublier que, bien que domestiquées, ces créatures n'en demeurent pas moins de féroces prédateurs. »

languages.text: "Sie hätte fast meinen Finger verschlungen ... zusammen mit einer Scheibe Alcedont. Ich bin selbst schuld. Ich hatte vergessen, dass sie Raubtiere sind, wenn auch domestizierte."
languages.original_text: "She almost ripped off my finger along with a slice of alcedont. It's my fault for forgetting they're predators, albeit domesticated ones."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hätte fast meinen Finger verschlungen ... zusammen mit einer Scheibe Alcedont. Ich bin selbst schuld. Ich hatte vergessen, dass sie Raubtiere sind, wenn auch domestizierte."
